data.comment: The first-half is under way at Jan Breydel Stadium - Cercle Brugge kick-off to start the match.
Johanna Omolo (Cercle Brugge) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 32, Pieter Gerkens heads in to make it 0-1 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Antwerp kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 52, Nill De Pauw is replacing Aurelio Buta for Antwerp at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The home team have replaced Kylian Hazard with Thibo Somers. This is the first substitution made today by Paul Clement.
Dieumerci Mbokani (Antwerp) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 65, Antwerp make their second substitution with Frank Boya replacing Pieter Gerkens.
Alexander Corryn is on a sub for Dimitar Velkovski for Cercle Brugge.
Jonathan Bolingi is replacing Lior Refaelov for the away team.
In the minute 80, Goal! Guy Carel Mbenza Kamboleke levels the match at 1-1.
Guy Carel Mbenza Kamboleke is on target to give Cercle Brugge a 2-1 advantage.
The home team replace Dino Hotic with Vitinho.
